name: Little Arena
description: Little Arena is an action-RPG with the opportunity to create your own character build. Think tactically, choose your talents wisely, to complete the game you will have to die more than once while finding a better strategy for the battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP and newer Processor: 2.0+ GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Graphics Storage: 50 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated Audio
